desc.description: The description of the device, ordinarily as reported by the operating system.
desc.name: Description

domain.description: The network domain where the device resides. For example: work.example.com.

group.description: The name of the group to which the device belongs. For example: <code>Windows Laptops<code/>.
group.name: Group

ip.description: The device IP address, in either IPv4 or IPv6 format.

location.description: The geographical location of the endpoint.

mac.description: The device Media Access Control (MAC) address.

name.description:
The alternate device name, ordinarily as assigned by an administrator.

Note: The Name could be any other string that helps to identify the device, such as a phone number; for example 310-555-1234.

ref_uid.description: The reference to a unique device identifier, generated by an log processing system.

type.description: The device type. For example: unknown, server, desktop, laptop, tablet, mobile, virtual, browser, or other.
type.name: Type

uid.description: The unique identifier of the device.
